Name: WIRED ICM Sample Dataset - Workshop on Intracranial Recordings in Humans, Epilepsy, DBS
Acknowledgements: The authors would like to acknowledge members of the Hamilton Lab, our clinical collaborators at Dell Children's Medical Center, and the patients who participated in this research.

HowToAcknowledge: Please acknowledge and include the original link to this repository and cite the authors if you use this data for any other purpose.
